Retouch

Professional Retoucher since 2011. Some of my works has been published in major magazines (Vogue Ukraine, L'Officiel, Elle, Madame Figaro, Harper's Bazaar, Grazia, Paper, Surface, Platik, D'Scene.) Also worked with clients such as Kate Moss, Naomi Campbell, Ewan McGregor, Willem Dafoe, Paris Hilton, Elle Fanning, etc.
